CutSceneText.Text: Hmm...you need Aether powerful enough to restore the Beluslan Observatory....
Well then, you'd better head for Leibo Island, I think.
It's hidden beneath the Eye of Reshanta, so hardly anyone knows it exists,
but the Aether there is the strongest in Reshanta.
Take this bottle. When you reach the island, remove the stopper and wait.
The Aether will flow into the bottle naturally.
